section.heading: Sales tax exemption for sales to Close Up Foundation.

annotations.annotation: Section (b) of this section as enacted by D.C. Law 17-307 stated that this section shall expire on December 31, 2012.

Applicability of D.C. Law 22-83: § 3 of D.C. Law 22-83 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 22-83 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
